attributes.action: abolish the erection of phone masts near schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: current government guidance states that phone masts should not be erected within 600 metres from a school but phone mast companies are still applying for planning permission and sometimes getting away with it. we hope to put a stop to this by making it law that councils can stop the phone companies doing this without it going through a planning application.
